thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Ellie Mae Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.28

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Ellie Mae Reports Q4 Earnings Per Share $0.28
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Ellie Mae Inc:
* ELLIE MAE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 RESULTS
* Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.33 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 17 PERCENT TO $112.9 MILLION * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.68 TO $1.78
* SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.07 TO $0.09
* SEES FY 2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.28 TO $0.38 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $495 MILLION TO $505 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 REVENUE $107 MILLION TO $109 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.25, REVENUE VIEW $108.2 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.22, REVENUE VIEW $109.1 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.63, REVENUE VIEW $491.3 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
